about_the_game:
Contains all of the musical tracks included in the base game.

1) Andy
2) Bixby
3) Danny
4) Lois
5) Lysandria
6) Magellan
7) Nature Peace
8) Tiberius
9) Wren

To install:

- Download the DLC.
- The music folder will be located in the game folder where your Steam game folders are located (steamapps/common/FurriesScaliesBears/)
detailed_description:
Contains all of the musical tracks included in the base game.

1) Andy
2) Bixby
3) Danny
4) Lois
5) Lysandria
6) Magellan
7) Nature Peace
8) Tiberius
9) Wren

To install:

- Download the DLC.
- The music folder will be located in the game folder where your Steam game folders are located (steamapps/common/FurriesScaliesBears/)
